name: Colin views the details for specific products

testSteps.description: 1: Colin views the details for specific products ({Product Name=Sauce Labs Backpack, Price=$29.99, Description=carry.allTheThings()})

children.description: Given Colin has logged onto the application
Given Colin is browsing the product catalog
Colin opens the https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
When Colin opens the product details for "Sauce Labs Backpack"
Colin clicks on the 'Sauce Labs Backpack' link

Then he should see a product with the following details:
| Name | Price | Description |
| Sauce Labs Backpack | $29.99 | carry.allTheThings() |
he should see the 'inventory_details_name' element with text value that is equal to (ignoring case): <"Sauce Labs Backpack">
he should see the 'inventory_details_price' element with text content that is equal to: <"$29.99">
he should see the 'inventory_details_desc' element with text value that contains: <[carry.allTheThings()]>

testSteps.description: 2: Colin views the details for specific products ({Product Name=Sauce Labs Bike Light, Price=$9.99, Description=A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding})

children.description: Given Colin has logged onto the application
Given Colin is browsing the product catalog
Colin opens the https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
When Colin opens the product details for "Sauce Labs Bike Light"
Colin clicks on the 'Sauce Labs Bike Light' link

Then he should see a product with the following details:
| Name | Price | Description |
| Sauce Labs Bike Light | $9.99 | A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding |
he should see the 'inventory_details_name' element with text value that is equal to (ignoring case): <"Sauce Labs Bike Light">
he should see the 'inventory_details_price' element with text content that is equal to: <"$9.99">
he should see the 'inventory_details_desc' element with text value that contains: <[A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding]>

he should see the 'inventory_details_desc' element with text value that contains: <[Get your testing superhero]>

testSteps.description: 4: Colin views the details for specific products ({Product Name=Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket, Price=$49.99, Description=a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket})

title: Colin views the details for specific products

values: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding
